Gravel Beds Card: <0>Plans should consider the protection of gravel bed habitats. This report summarizes the amount and proportion of gravel beds found in the plan. </0>

📈 Report: The percentage of each feature type within this plan is calculated by finding the overlap of each feature type with the plan, summing its area, then dividing it by the total area of each feature type found within the selected nearshore planning area. If the plan includes multiple areas that overlap, the overlap is only counted once.

SizeCard - introduction: national waters extend from the shoreline out to 200 nautical miles, known as the Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ). This report summarizes offshore plan overlap with the EEZ and other boundaries within it, measuring progress towards achieving % targets for each boundary.
SizeCard - learn more:
<0> This report summarizes the size and proportion of this plan within these boundaries.

If sketch boundaries within a plan overlap with each other, the overlap is only counted once.
